name: Dream On The Moon
description: Dream on the moon is a ragdoll, physics Stick Man sandbox game with different dreams (game modes) on the moon. Play sports and combat against each other with swords, guns etc.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 2000, XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1 GHZ Memory: 256 MB RAM MB RAM Graphics: 64 MB 3D video card with DirectX OR OpenGL support Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: Version 9.0
